ground_truth: Ben and Elaine are walking along in front of one of the outside animal cages, with Ben a step or two behind her. Carl strides up to them, takes the pipe out of his mouth, and puts it in his pocket, reaching out to take Elaine's hands. Carl frowns and looks over Elaine's shoulder at Ben, who smiles and steps forward to grasp Carl's hand. Carl steps back and puts an arm around Elaine's shoulder. The three of them look at each other for a moment. There is another KNOCK, and Elaine is standing in the hall. Ben nods, moves in behind her, and puts his hand on her arm as several boys gather in the hallway trying to see into the room. Ben edges through the door into the hallway, opens the door a little way, and they all try to see in. The boys start back to their rooms, leaving Mr. McCleery and Ben standing and looking at each other for a few seconds before Mr. McCleery turns away, walks down the hall, and starts down the stairs. Ben turns and goes back into the room where Elaine sits in a chair, watching him as he goes to the bureau, takes some shirts from a drawer, and puts them in the suitcase before going back to the bureau. He gets down on his knees to look under the bureau, then returns to the bureau to get some socks and underwear, carrying them to the suitcase. He goes back to the bureau again, opens a drawer, takes out some T-shirts and the beer can, and carries them to the suitcase. Elaine gets up, goes to the door, and opens it, walking out and shutting the door behind her. Ben crosses to the window, and through the window, we see Elaine walking away, the length of the street until she disappears. Ben is asleep in his bed and suddenly sits up, standing in the darkness by the door. He gets out of bed, goes to her, and they kiss. She shakes her head, nods, goes to the door, opens it, and steps into the hall. He goes to the door as students move quickly from building to building. Ben is walking alongside Elaine as they move up the steps of a classroom building. Ben pushes through a lot of students to keep up with Elaine as they walk down a corridor with open doors on each side to classrooms with students filing into each of them. Elaine turns into one of the doors, leaving Ben in the hall as all the classroom doors close, and he leans against the wall.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Ben and Elaine are strolling along in front of one of the exterior creature enclosures, with Ben a pace or two behind her. Carl strides up to them, removes the pipe from his mouth, and places it in his pocket, extending a hand to take Elaine's hands. Carl scowls and looks over Elaine's shoulder at Ben, who grins and steps forward to grasp Carl's hand. Carl steps back and places an arm around Elaine's shoulder. The three of them gaze at each other for a moment. There is another KNOCK, and Elaine is standing in the hallway. Ben nods, moves in behind her, and places his hand on her arm as several boys congregate in the corridor attempting to see into the room. Ben edges through the door into the hallway, opens the door slightly, and they all attempt to see in. The boys start back to their rooms, leaving Mr. McCleery and Ben standing and looking at each other for a few seconds before Mr. McCleery turns away, marches down the hallway, and starts down the stairs. Ben turns and goes back into the room where Elaine sits in a chair, observing him as he goes to the dresser, takes some shirts from a drawer, and places them in the suitcase before going back to the dresser. He kneels to look under the dresser, then returns to the dresser to get some socks and underwear, carrying them to the suitcase. He goes back to the dresser again, opens a drawer, takes out some T-shirts and the beer can, and carries them to the suitcase. Elaine rises, goes to the door, and opens it, exiting and shutting the door behind her. Ben crosses to the window, and through the window, we see Elaine walking away, the length of the street until she vanishes. Ben is asleep in his bed and suddenly sits up, standing in the darkness by the door. He gets out of bed, goes to her, and they kiss. She shakes her head, nods, goes to the door, opens it, and steps into the hallway. He goes to the door as students move swiftly from building to building. Ben is strolling alongside Elaine as they move up the steps of a classroom building. Ben pushes through a swarm of students to keep pace with Elaine as they walk down a passageway with open doors on each side to classrooms with students filing into each one. Elaine turns into one of the doors, leaving Ben in the hallway as all the classroom doors close, and he leans against the wall.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Ben and Elaine are being walked along by Carl in front of one of the outside animal cages, with Elaine a step or two in front of him. Carl strides up to them, takes the pipe out of his mouth, and puts it in his pocket while Elaine's hands are taken by him. A frown is given by Carl, and Elaine's shoulder is looked over by him at Ben, who is smiled at and stepped forward by Carl to have his hand grasped. An arm is put around Elaine's shoulder by Carl, who steps back. They are looked at by the three of them for a moment. Another KNOCK is heard, and the hall is stood in by Elaine. A nod is given by Ben, who moves in behind her and places a hand on her arm as several boys gather in the hallway to try to see into the room. Through the door, Ben edges into the hallway, opens the door a little way, and attempts are made by them all to see in. The boys start back to their rooms, leaving Mr. McCleery and Ben standing and looking at each other for a few seconds before Mr. McCleery turns away, walks down the hall, and begins going down the stairs. The room is returned to by Ben where Elaine is sitting in a chair, watching him as he goes to the bureau, removes some shirts from a drawer, and puts them in the suitcase before going back to the bureau. His knees are gotten down on by him to look under the bureau, then the bureau is returned to by him to get some socks and underwear, carrying them to the suitcase. The bureau is approached by him again, a drawer is opened, and T-shirts and the beer can are taken out and carried to the suitcase. Elaine gets up, goes to the door, opens it, and walks out, shutting the door behind her. The window is crossed to by Ben, and through the window, Elaine is seen walking away, the length of the street until she disappears. The bed is slept in by Ben, and suddenly he sits up, standing in the darkness by the door. The bed is gotten out of by him, he goes to her, and a kiss is exchanged by them. Her head is shaken, then a nod is given by her, she goes to the door, opens it, and steps into the hall. The door is approached by him as students move quickly from building to building. Elaine is walked alongside by Ben as they move up the steps of a classroom building. A lot of students are pushed through by Ben to keep up with Elaine as a corridor is walked down by them with open doors on each side to classrooms students are filing into. Elaine turns into one of the doors, leaving Ben in the hall as all the classroom doors are closed, and he leans against the wall.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Ben and Elaine walk in front of an animal cage, with Ben slightly behind. Carl approaches, removes his pipe, and shakes Elaine's hands, then looks at Ben, who smiles and shakes Carl's hand. Carl puts an arm around Elaine. After a knock, Elaine is in the hall, and Ben follows, placing his hand on her arm as boys gather. As Ben and Mr. McCleery exchange glances, the boys leave, and Mr. McCleery departs. Inside, Ben packs clothes into a suitcase while Elaine watches. She leaves, and Ben sees her walk away through the window. Ben, initially asleep, awakes, approaches Elaine, and they kiss. She nods and exits into the hall. Ben follows her among students moving between buildings. They ascend classroom steps, and Elaine enters a room, leaving Ben in the hall as the doors close behind her.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Ben and Elaine walk in front of an animal cage, with Ben a step behind. Carl approaches, removes his pipe, and shakes Elaine's hands, frowning at Ben. Ben smiles, shakes Carl's hand, and Carl puts an arm around Elaine. They pause, then Elaine stands in the hall. Ben follows, putting his hand on her arm as boys gather, trying to see inside. Ben enters the hallway, opens the door slightly, and the boys retreat, leaving Ben and Mr. McCleery exchanging glances before McCleery departs. Ben returns to Elaine, packs shirts, socks, and T-shirts, and places a beer can in his suitcase. Elaine leaves the room, and Ben watches her walk away through the window. Ben, asleep, suddenly awakens and kisses her before she exits into the hall. Students move quickly as Ben keeps up with Elaine, walking into a classroom building. She enters a classroom, leaving Ben in the hallway, leaning against the wall as doors close.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
Ben and Elaine are casually strolling together in front of one of the outdoor animal cages, with Ben trailing just a step or two behind her. As they continue their leisurely walk, Carl strides confidently up to them, removing the pipe from his mouth and slipping it into his pocket. He reaches out to take hold of Elaine's hands with a friendly gesture. Carl frowns slightly and casts a glance over Elaine's shoulder in the direction of Ben, who responds with a cheerful smile and steps forward to clasp Carl's hand warmly. Carl then steps back, placing a comforting arm around Elaine's shoulder. The three of them exchange looks for a brief moment, silently acknowledging each other's presence.

Suddenly, there is another distinct KNOCK, and Elaine is now standing in the hallway. Ben gives a nod, moves to position himself behind her, and gently places his hand on her arm as several boys gather in the hallway, curiously trying to peer into the room. As Ben deftly edges through the door into the hallway, he opens it slightly, and they all collectively attempt to catch a glimpse inside. Eventually, the boys start retreating back to their rooms, leaving Mr. McCleery and Ben standing and exchanging glances for a few seconds before Mr. McCleery turns away, walks down the length of the hall, and begins his descent down the stairs.

Ben then turns and re-enters the room where Elaine is seated in a chair, watching intently as he approaches the bureau. He takes several shirts from a drawer and places them in the suitcase, then returns to the bureau. Getting down on his knees, Ben peers beneath the bureau before standing back up and retrieving some socks and underwear, which he carries over to the suitcase. He makes another trip back to the bureau, opens a drawer, and takes out some T-shirts along with a beer can, which he also adds to the suitcase. Elaine rises from her chair, walks to the door, opens it, and steps out, closing the door gently behind her.

Ben crosses over to the window, and through the glass, we can see Elaine walking away down the length of the street until she completely disappears from sight. Later, Ben is asleep in his bed but suddenly sits up, standing silently in the darkness by the door. He gets out of bed, approaches her, and they share a kiss. She shakes her head, nods in understanding, and goes to the door, opening it and stepping into the hall. He follows her to the door as students are bustling around, moving swiftly from one building to another. Ben is once again walking alongside Elaine as they ascend the steps of a classroom building. He pushes his way through a crowd of students to keep up with Elaine as they make their way down a corridor lined with classrooms, with doors open on each side as students file into them. Elaine turns into one of these doors, leaving Ben standing in the hallway as all the classroom doors close in unison, and he leans against the wall, taking a moment to reflect.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
Ben and Elaine are casually strolling together, with Elaine leading by just a step or two, as they make their way in front of one of the intriguing outdoor animal cages. As they continue their leisurely walk, Carl confidently strides up to them with a purposeful air, carefully removing the pipe from his mouth and slipping it into his pocket for safekeeping. With a friendly gesture, he reaches out to warmly take hold of Elaine's hands. Carl frowns slightly, casting a glance over Elaine's shoulder in the direction of Ben. In response, Ben offers a cheerful smile, stepping forward to warmly clasp Carl's hand in a friendly manner. Carl then steps back, placing a comforting arm gently around Elaine's shoulder. For a brief moment, the three of them exchange meaningful looks, silently acknowledging each other's presence in this shared moment.

Suddenly, a distinct KNOCK breaks the silence, and Elaine finds herself standing in the hallway. Ben gives a knowing nod, moves smoothly to position himself behind her, and gently places his hand on her arm. Several curious boys gather in the hallway, trying to peer into the room with a mix of eagerness and intrigue. As Ben deftly edges through the door into the hallway, he opens it slightly, creating a small opening as they all collectively attempt to catch a glimpse inside. Gradually, the boys begin to retreat back to their respective rooms, leaving Mr. McCleery and Ben standing there, exchanging glances for a few seconds before Mr. McCleery turns away. He walks down the length of the hall with measured steps and begins his descent down the stairs, leaving Ben standing quietly.

Ben then turns and re-enters the room where Elaine is seated comfortably in a chair, watching intently as he approaches the bureau with a focused demeanor. He steadily takes several shirts from a drawer and places them neatly in the suitcase, then returns to the bureau. Getting down on his knees, Ben peers beneath the bureau, searching carefully before standing back up. He retrieves some socks and underwear, which he carries over to the suitcase with a sense of purpose. He makes another trip back to the bureau, opens a drawer, and takes out some T-shirts along with a beer can, which he also adds to the growing contents of the suitcase. Elaine rises gracefully from her chair, walks to the door with quiet determination, opens it, and steps out, closing the door gently behind her with a sense of finality.

Ben crosses over to the window, and through the glass, we see Elaine walking away down the length of the street, continuing on her path until she completely disappears from sight. Later, Ben is asleep in his bed but suddenly sits up, standing silently in the darkness by the door. He gets out of bed and approaches her with quiet intensity, and they share a heartfelt kiss. She shakes her head, nods in understanding, and goes to the door, opening it and stepping into the hall with a sense of purpose. He follows her to the door as students are bustling around energetically, moving swiftly from one building to another. Ben is once again walking alongside Elaine as they ascend the steps of a bustling classroom building. He pushes his way through a crowd of students with determination to keep up with Elaine as they make their way down a corridor lined with classrooms, with doors open on each side as students file into them. Elaine turns into one of these doors, leaving Ben standing in the hallway as all the classroom doors close in unison. He leans against the wall, taking a thoughtful moment to reflect on everything that has transpired.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Ben and Elaine are walking side by side in front of one of the outside animal cages, with Ben trailing a step or two behind her, maintaining a close distance. Carl approaches them with a confident stride, removing the pipe from his mouth with one hand and smoothly slipping it into his pocket before extending his arm to gently take hold of Elaine's hands. Carl's expression changes to a frown as he shifts his gaze over Elaine's shoulder, directing a scrutinizing look towards Ben. In response to Carl's gaze, Ben offers a friendly smile and promptly steps forward, closing the distance to firmly grasp Carl's hand in a gesture of camaraderie. Carl then takes a step back, withdrawing slightly before draping his arm affectionately around Elaine's shoulder, bringing the three of them into a moment of silent exchange as they all look at each other, conveying unspoken understanding. Suddenly, the sound of a knock echoes through the scene, and Elaine finds herself standing in the hall. Ben acknowledges the situation with a nod, moves in closer behind Elaine, and gently places his hand on her arm for reassurance as a curious group of boys assembles in the hallway, their interest piqued as they try to peer into the room. Ben maneuvers himself through the narrow opening of the door into the hallway, cautiously pushing the door ajar to allow a vantage point as the group collectively attempts to glimpse inside. The boys, sensing the need to retreat, begin their trek back to their respective rooms, leaving Mr. McCleery and Ben momentarily standing opposite each other, exchanging a brief, silent look. This moment is interrupted as Mr. McCleery turns to leave, navigating his way down the hall and then descending the stairs. Ben watches him go before redirecting his attention and reentering the room where Elaine sits calmly in a chair, her eyes following Ben as he approaches the bureau. He opens a drawer, selecting some shirts and carefully placing them into an open suitcase before returning to the bureau. Kneeling, he peers under it for anything he might have missed, and then rises to collect some socks and underwear, methodically adding them to the suitcase. Returning once more to the bureau, he opens another drawer, extracting a stack of T-shirts and a beer can, which he deposits into the suitcase. Meanwhile, Elaine rises from her chair, moves towards the door, and with quiet resolve, opens it and exits the room, shutting the door softly behind her. Ben crosses the room to the window where he observes Elaine walking away, following her with his eyes as she continues the length of the street until she eventually vanishes from view. Later, as Ben lies asleep in his bed, he abruptly awakens, sitting up with a start before standing in the darkness near the door. He quickly gets out of bed, approaches Elaine, and they share a kiss. Elaine pulls back slightly, signaling her decision with a shake of her head followed by a nod, then makes her way to the door, opens it, and steps into the hall. Ben follows her to the door as a stream of students rushes by, moving swiftly from one building to another. Now, Ben walks alongside Elaine as they climb the steps toward a classroom building. As Elaine leads the way, Ben weaves through the crowd of students, determinedly keeping pace with her as they navigate down a corridor lined with open doors leading to classrooms where students are filing in. Elaine makes a decisive turn into one of the classrooms, leaving Ben standing alone in the hall as the surrounding classroom doors close synchronously, and he leans against the wall, momentarily left to his thoughts.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Ben and Elaine stroll past the outside animal cages, with Ben slightly trailing. Carl approaches, removes the pipe from his mouth, pockets it, and takes Elaine's hands. He frowns at Ben, who smiles and steps forward to shake Carl's hand, prompting Carl to step back and place an arm around Elaine. After a brief, mutual glance, a knock occurs, and Elaine stands in the hall. Ben nods, follows her, and places a hand on her arm as several boys gather to peer into the room. Ben maneuvers into the hallway, slightly opens the door, and they all attempt to see inside. The boys retreat to their rooms, leaving Mr. McCleery and Ben to exchange a look before Mr. McCleery departs down the hall and stairs. Ben returns to the room where Elaine watches him pack shirts, socks, underwear, T-shirts, and a beer can into his suitcase after rummaging through the bureau. Elaine exits the room, shutting the door as Ben watches her walk away through the window until she disappears down the street. Ben, initially asleep, sits up, then stands by the door in the dark. He rises, goes to Elaine, and they share a kiss. She shakes her head, nods, and exits into the hall, with Ben following to the door as students bustle between buildings. Ben and Elaine head up classroom building steps together. As Elaine enters a classroom, Ben, left in the hall, navigates through students and leans against the wall after classroom doors close behind her.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Ben and Elaine are walking along in front of one of the outside animal cages, likely at the city zoo known for its exotic species collection, with Ben a step or two behind her. Carl strides up to them, a known figure in the community who often visits the zoo, takes the pipe out of his mouth, and puts it in his pocket, reaching out to take Elaine's hands in a warm greeting. Carl frowns, a reflection of his protective nature, and looks over Elaine's shoulder at Ben, who smiles and steps forward to grasp Carl's hand, signaling camaraderie. Carl steps back and puts an arm around Elaine's shoulder, showing a familial bond. The three of them look at each other for a moment, sharing a silent connection. There is another KNOCK, echoing through the building’s quiet corridors, and Elaine is standing in the hall of the college dormitory. Ben nods, moves in behind her, and puts his hand on her arm as several boys gather in the hallway trying to see into the room, hoping to catch a glimpse of the commotion. Ben edges through the door into the hallway, opens the door a little way, and they all try to see in, curiosity piqued by the event. The boys start back to their rooms, leaving Mr. McCleery, the dormitory's resident advisor known for his strict but fair demeanor, and Ben standing and looking at each other for a few seconds before Mr. McCleery, with a nod of approval, turns away, walks down the hall, and starts down the stairs. Ben turns and goes back into the room where Elaine sits in a chair, watching him as he goes to the bureau, an antique piece passed down through generations, takes some shirts from a drawer, and puts them in the suitcase before going back to the bureau. He gets down on his knees to look under the bureau, checking for anything missed, then returns to the bureau to get some socks and underwear, carrying them to the suitcase. He goes back to the bureau again, opens a drawer, takes out some T-shirts and the beer can, a souvenir from a memorable college party, and carries them to the suitcase. Elaine gets up, goes to the door, and opens it, walking out and shutting the door behind her with a sense of finality. Ben crosses to the window, and through the window, we see Elaine walking away, the length of the street lined with autumn trees until she disappears into the distance. Ben is asleep in his bed and suddenly sits up, standing in the darkness by the door, feeling the weight of unspoken words. He gets out of bed, goes to her, and they kiss, a tender moment of reconciliation. She shakes her head, nods, a silent agreement passing between them, goes to the door, opens it, and steps into the hall that echoes with the sounds of students. He goes to the door as students move quickly from building to building, a typical day on campus. Ben is walking alongside Elaine as they move up the steps of a classroom building, part of the historic quadrangle known for its Neo-Gothic architecture. Ben pushes through a lot of students to keep up with Elaine as they walk down a corridor with open doors on each side to classrooms with students filing into each of them, each door marking a new possibility. Elaine turns into one of the doors, leaving Ben in the hall as all the classroom doors close, and he leans against the wall, contemplating the path ahead.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Tom and Linda are skipping beside one of the indoor fish tanks, with Tom a leap or two ahead of her. Jerry marches towards them, removes the feather from his hat, and places it in his backpack, reaching out to tickle Linda's toes. Jerry scowls and peers past Linda’s elbow at Tom, who giggles and lunges forward to swat Jerry's elbow. Jerry shuffles backward and sets an ankle around Linda’s waist. The three of them stare at one another for a moment. There is another CHIME, and Linda is lounging in the garden. Tom winks, slides in front of her, and places his nose on her elbow as several cats gather in the garden trying to peek into the greenhouse. Tom shuffles through the arch into the garden, swings the gateway slightly ajar, and they all attempt to peek inside. The cats slink back to their nooks, leaving Mr. Hedges and Tom staring at each other for a few seconds before Mr. Hedges spins away, skips through the garden, and begins leaping down the ladder. Tom twirls and prances back into the greenhouse where Linda perches on a stool, observing him as he skips to the dresser, extracts some scarves from a compartment, and tucks them into the backpack before skipping back to the dresser. He kneels on his elbows to peer under the dresser, then skips back to the dresser to grab some gloves and hats, ferrying them to the backpack. He skips back to the dresser again, pries open a compartment, extracts some mittens and the soda bottle, and ferries them to the backpack. Linda hops up, saunters to the portal, and swings it open, skipping out and closing the portal behind her. Tom prances to the skylight, and through the skylight, we see Linda skipping away, the length of the avenue until she vanishes. Tom is dozing on his sofa and suddenly bounces up, standing in the shadows by the gateway. He jumps off the sofa, skips to her, and they hug. She tilts her head, nods, skips to the gateway, swings it open, and hops into the meadow. He hops to the gateway as dancers twirl swiftly from structure to structure. Tom is skipping beside Linda as they hop up the ramp of a dormitory building. Tom bumps through a crowd of dancers to keep pace with Linda as they skip down a corridor with ajar portals on each side to dormitories with dancers shuffling into each of them. Linda veers into one of the portals, abandoning Tom in the corridor as all the dormitory portals swing shut, and he slumps against the beam.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Ben and Elaine walk in front of an animal cage, with Ben trailing slightly. Carl approaches, puts away his pipe, and greets them by taking Elaine's hands. Carl, Ben, and Elaine exchange a tense glance before a knock interrupts them, prompting Ben to guide Elaine through a crowded hallway where boys try to peer into a room. Mr. McCleery and Ben share a brief look before McCleery leaves, and Ben packs clothes into a suitcase. After Elaine exits, Ben watches her walk away through the window. Later, Ben wakes suddenly in bed, goes to Elaine, and they kiss before she leaves. Ben accompanies Elaine to a classroom building, struggling to keep up. They part ways as Elaine enters a classroom, leaving Ben alone in the hall as the doors close around him.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: Elaine turns into one of the doors leaving Ben in the hall as all the classroom doors close and he leans against the wall Ben pushes through a lot of students to keep up with Elaine as they walk down a corridor with open doors on each side to classrooms with students filing into each of them Ben is walking alongside Elaine as they move up the steps of a classroom building He goes to the door as students move quickly from building to building She shakes her head nods goes to the door opens it and steps into the hall He gets out of bed goes to her and they kiss Ben is asleep in his bed and suddenly sits up standing in the darkness by the door Ben crosses to the window and through the window we see Elaine walking away the length of the street until she disappears Elaine gets up goes to the door and opens it walking out and shutting the door behind her He goes back to the bureau again opens a drawer takes out some Tshirts and the beer can and carries them to the suitcase He gets down on his knees to look under the bureau then returns to the bureau to get some socks and underwear carrying them to the suitcase Ben turns and goes back into the room where Elaine sits in a chair watching him as he goes to the bureau takes some shirts from a drawer and puts them in the suitcase before going back to the bureau The boys start back to their rooms leaving Mr McCleery and Ben standing and looking at each other for a few seconds before Mr McCleery turns away walks down the hall and starts down the stairs Ben edges through the door into the hallway opens the door a little way and they all try to see in Ben nods moves in behind her and puts his hand on her arm as several boys gather in the hallway trying to see into the room There is another KNOCK and Elaine is standing in the hall The three of them look at each other for a moment Carl steps back and puts an arm around Elaine's shoulder Carl frowns and looks over Elaine's shoulder at Ben who smiles and steps forward to grasp Carl's hand Carl strides up to them takes the pipe out of his mouth and puts it in his pocket reaching out to take Elaine's hands Ben and Elaine are walking along in front of one of the outside animal cages with Ben a step or two behind her
